Key Match Events: Adam Zampa took 4 wickets for 47 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Adam Zampa: 'Cummins spell was a game-changer for us'
Kusal Mendis: 'Hoping the bowlers know their roles'
Steve Smith: 'We need to find our best form quickly'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia won by 5 wickets with 88 balls remaining
Zampa named Player of the Match
Others: Sri Lanka scored 209 runs in 43.3 overs
